MAN.TITLE: drawnow

DESCRIPTION.P: Considering the current figure, this function can be used to draw the hidden graphics entities and all its chidren, that may have been postponed by a previous call to drawlater. The immadiate_drawing property of the current figure is set to "on" .
It can specially be used with the drawlater function.
